name: Beggar Knight
description:
Beggar Knight is a 2D Action Platformer Mobile Game.

(also playable with a controller!)

Move - WASD (or DPad)
Attack - L (or X button)
Jump / Double Jump - Spacebar (A button)
Pause / Mute - Esc 

Beggar Knight is a 2D Action Platformer game currently in development which is aimed to reach Mobile Platforms (Android, iOS). The demo you are playing is just a technical one, where just the main gameplay is shown: the game will be further improved by the team. 

The demo was built with passion using Unity Engine and crispy pixel art in just 3 months of free time work (from 0 to 3 hours per day). 

  • Programmer & Producer: Fabio Runci
  • Art Director and Pixel Artist: Andrea Settimii
  • Game and Level Designer: Luca Gambadoro
  • Music and Sound Designer: Federico Arosio
